description: Creates a new page in Notion with a specified title and content. Use this to store new information, notes, or documents.

page_name.description: The title or name of the new Notion page.

page_content.description: The full text content to be placed inside the new page. Can include Markdown for formatting. page_content must be strictly less than 2000 characters.

description: Searches for existing pages in Notion by title or content. Use this to find information before creating a new page to avoid duplicates.

query.description: The keyword, phrase, or question to search for within Notion.
